products.name: Organic Red Apples
products.description: Crisp and juicy organic red apples grown in rich soil without pesticides. Naturally sweet, perfect for snacking, baking, or adding to salads.

products.name: Fresh Bananas
products.description: Sweet and creamy bananas ripened under tropical sunshine. Packed with potassium and fiber, ideal for a quick snack or smoothie base.

products.name: Sweet Oranges
products.description: Bright and tangy organic oranges bursting with vitamin C. Perfect for juicing or enjoying as a refreshing snack.

products.name: Juicy Mangoes
products.description: Lusciously sweet mangoes with a smooth texture and tropical aroma. Excellent for desserts, smoothies, or eating fresh.

products.name: Green Grapes
products.description: Crisp, seedless green grapes with a refreshing sweetness. Ideal for snacking, fruit salads, or pairing with cheese.

products.name: Ripe Strawberries
products.description: Plump, fragrant strawberries with vibrant color and natural sweetness. Perfect for desserts, jams, or eating fresh.

products.name: Fresh Blueberries
products.description: Tiny bursts of sweet-tart flavor packed with antioxidants. Great for cereals, baking, or eating straight from the pack.

products.name: Organic Kiwis
products.description: Tangy-sweet kiwis with vibrant green flesh. High in vitamin C and fiber, perfect for smoothies or fruit salads.

products.name: Pineapples
products.description: Golden pineapples with tropical sweetness and juicy texture. Delicious grilled, juiced, or eaten fresh.

products.name: Watermelons
products.description: Juicy and refreshing watermelons, naturally hydrating and sweet. Perfect for hot summer days.

products.name: Papayas
products.description: Soft, sweet papayas with bright orange flesh. Rich in vitamins A and C, great for breakfast or smoothies.

products.name: Cherries
products.description: Sweet and juicy cherries with deep red color. A summer favorite for snacking or baking.

products.name: Peaches

products.name: Plums

products.name: Pears
